title: Colors & Typography
description: Master color values, backgrounds, and text styling in CSS

steps.title: Step 1: Color Values
steps.content:
CSS supports multiple color formats:
- **Named colors**: `red`, `blue`, `cyan`
- **Hex codes**: `#00ffff`, `#ff0000`
- **RGB**: `rgb(0, 255, 255)`
- **RGBA**: `rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5)` (with transparency)

Hex codes are the most common in web development.

steps.title: Step 2: Background Colors
steps.content:
The `background-color` property sets the background of an element.

You can use any color format: named, hex, RGB, or RGBA.

task.hint: Use 'background-color' for the background and 'color' for the text

steps.title: Step 3: Font Properties
steps.content:
Control text appearance with typography properties:
- `font-family` - typeface (Arial, monospace, etc.)
- `font-size` - size in px, em, rem
- `font-weight` - boldness (normal, bold, 100-900)
- `text-align` - alignment (left, center, right)

steps.title: Step 4: Putting It Together
steps.content:
Now combine colors and typography to create a cyberpunk-styled element!

Dark backgrounds with bright neon text are signature to the cyberpunk aesthetic.
